content:
in a mass email from Todd Short Director of Emergency Planning he described the Universitys plans to test the new emergency notification system IlliniAlert on Tues PERIOD March  at  a.m PERIOD

Short also reminded all students that there is not certainty in the delivery of a notification PERIOD

I want to encourage everyone if possible to take full advantage of the system by providing both an alternate email address as well as a cell phone number for text messaging Short said in the email PERIOD
title: Illini-Alert to be tested again - The Daily Illini
name: University of Illinois Urbana Champaign
